ctu_text:
Under this scheme, one hot cooked meal will be provided to the children studying in Government and Government – aided schools. The Scheme is implemented across the country covering all the eligible children without any discrimination of gender and social class.
The main objectives of the PM POSHAN Abhiyaan are to address two of the pressing problems for the majority of children in India, viz. hunger and education by improving the nutritional status of eligible children in Government and Government-aided schools as well as encouraging poor children, belonging to disadvantaged sections, to attend school more regularly and help them concentrate on classroom activities.
image_prompt: Flat-icon infographic, pastel palette – Under this scheme, one hot cooked meal will be provided to the children studying in Government and Government \u2013 aid
caption: Poster 2/4 – Eligibility (numbers verified)

ctu_text: POSHAN Abhiyaan is one of the many schemes under the umbrella scheme "Integrated Child Development Services Scheme (ICDS)". ICDS also includes Anganwadi Services Scheme, Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana, and Scheme for Adolescent Girls. "}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Offline", "url": "", "process": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "There is no application process for this scheme. PM POSHAN is equally applicable to all children who are studying in Government and Government – aided schools.
